event.title: were listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1975

data.event: Daffin House and St. Paul's Episcopal Church were listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1975.
Evidence shows that as early as 1694 there was an Anglican chapel-of-ease located on the Eastern bank of the Tuckahoe.
The first newspaper to be published in Caroline County was published in Hillsboro in 1831 by Lucas Brothers.
In 1804 there was a fever epidemic in Hillsboro then again in 1816; both occurred in the same house the Seller residence.
